title: The sky was red-pink
content:
The sky was red-pink
Clouds drifting over the brink
I just returned from you
Sunset’s blaze
Defines us.

Whirling in a fantastic universe
Sky seemed to split in two
Cavern seized me could I get through
Nature’s process gracefully or die
Overcome by age?

Or can I dive right through to the center of the chasm
I let go
Spirit remains

Photograph by Jason Fishman
